^(blockOnPolicyViolation)$.description: "optional" allow us to detect if the value is explicitly set

^(policiesAllowedHostnames)$.description: array of hostnames that are allowed to be used in the policies

^(updatePoliciesAllowedHostnames)$.description:
flag that allows us to detect if the value is explicitly set
 since repeated fields can not be optional

policies_allowed_hostnames.description: array of hostnames that are allowed to be used in the policies

update_policies_allowed_hostnames.description:
flag that allows us to detect if the value is explicitly set
 since repeated fields can not be optional
